description._content: Add a photo to a gallery.

error._content: One or more required parameters was not included with your API call.
That gallery could not be found.
The requested photo could not be found.
The comment body could not be validated.
Unable to add the photo to the gallery.
Only public photos can be added to a gallery
Gallery owner is same as the photo owner.
Photo is already in the gallery
The photo owner opted this photo out of this galleries
Gallery has the maximum allowed items.
Only Safe photos can be added to a gallery.
The photo owner has blocked the gallery owner.
The photo owner has opted out of all galleries.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.
The passed signature was invalid.
The call required signing but no signature was sent.
The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

error.message: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
error._content: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: gallery_id
argument._content: The ID of the gallery to add a photo to. Note: this is the compound ID returned in methods like flickr.galleries.getList, and flickr.galleries.getListForPhoto.

argument.name: photo_id
argument._content: The photo ID to add to the gallery

argument.name: comment
argument._content: A short comment or story to accompany the photo.

argument.name: full_response
argument._content: If specified, return updated details of the gallery the photo was added to
